title: Kattikida Lyrics Kaaki Sattai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kattikida Song Lyrics From Kaaki Sattai
Lyrics: Anthony Dassan
Singers: Anthony Dassan, Manasi, Anita

Kattikida munnae naam
oththigaya paakkanumdi
kaththukadi maaman kitta
aththanayum aththupadi.

Vida maatten ponnae naaney
unna pichi thinna poren maaney

Kannae un kannam rendum
mulle illaa rosavadi.
ponne un kendakaalu
moagaththathaan thoonduthadi.

oadaadha en pulli maaney
nee illayinna
vembi ponnaen.

Achchaaram potta pinne
aasaikenna velliyadi
Aaththaa un koyillukku
poosa panna naanum redi.

un sannadhi thaedithaaney
ada odi ingu vandhaen naaney.

odhungi podaa thalli
naan mullirukkum kalli.

enai thottuputta
anga ingae kuthi vaippeney

Adikkiriye solli
ara size-u gilli.
enkitta vandha
vaala ottaa narikkiduveney.

Kattikida munnae naam
oththigaya paakkanumdi
kaththukadi maaman kitta
aththanayum aththupadi.

Vida maatten ponnae naaney
unna pichi thinna poren naaney

Thaaram aadhaaram aagappora
saedhaaramaa vaa

Aakka poruththa en maama
unakku
aara porukkalayaa

Vaadi en jodi neethaanadi
orasi paaththukalaam

Vaaren samsaaram aanapinney
pasiya theeththukkalaam

Adi piththaanen unnaala
siththiramey
enna kollaama kolluriye.

Naan dhinusaaga porandheney
unakkaaga valarndheney
allaama alluyire

odhungi podaa thalli
naan mullirukkum kalli.

enai thottuputta
anga ingae kuthi vaippeney

Adikkiriye solli
ara size-u gilli.
enkitta vandha
vaala ottaa narikkiduveney.

Kattikida munnae naam
oththigaya paakkanumdi
kaththukadi maaman kitta
aththanayum aththupadi.

Vida maatten ponnae naaney
unna pichi thinna poren maaney

Kannae un kannam rendum
mulle illaa rosavadi.
ponne un kendakaalu
moagaththathaan thoonduthadi.

oadaadha en pulli maaney
nee illayinna
vembi ponnaen. (chi paavam)

Achchaaram potta pinne
aasaikenna velliyadi
Aaththaa un koyillukku
poosa panna naanum redi.

un sannadhi thaedithaaney
ada odi ingu vandhaen naaney.

odhungi podaa thalli
naan mullirukkum kalli.

enai thottuputta
anga ingae kuthi vaippeney

Adikkiriye solli
ara size-u gilli.
enkitta vandha
vaala ottaa narikkiduveney.
